summary: This is a brief email correspondence from August 12, 2019, forwarding an attachment regarding Carlos Sanchez Galan, an inmate at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center. The email appears to be administrative communication, possibly from a legal or support service, and is part of the Epstein-related document set.

persons.name: Carlos Sanchez Galan
